content: If you need more storage, please select the amount you'd like to add.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message that prompts users to select an amount of storage they need. It appears in a dialog box within the "Storage" category settings, where it is linked to a button with the same name ("MoreStorage").

usage.context: {t("CurrencyPerMonth", { currency })} ) : null} {t("MoreStorage")} {amount ? (
